docs.snippet: The Golden State Warriors are almost a metaphor for the way the tech industry improves, and also risks ruining, all that it touches....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors are almost a metaphor for the way the tech industry improves, and also risks ruining, all that it touches.
docs.abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column says Oakland-based Golden State Warriors are ideal mascot for Silicon Valley entrepreneurs and executives; holds for bandwagon fans, team seems to have come out of nowhere and disrupted basketball, making it strong metaphor for tech world values; points out team is soon moving to San Francisco, and that rising ticket prices are leaving ordinary fans angry.

headline.main: Warriors, Tech’s Team, Are Soaring Out of Reach
headline.print_headline: A Basketball Team as a Metaphor for Tech

docs.snippet: Though our lesson plans will be on vacation until mid-August, election news will continue to dominate the headlines all summer long. Here are a few ways students can keep up with the candidates, campaigns, conventions and controversies — and mak...
docs.abstract: Though our lesson plans will be on vacation until mid-August, election news will continue to dominate the headlines all summer long. Here are a few ways students can keep up with the candidates, campaigns, conventions and controversies — and make their own opinions heard.

headline.main: Election 2016: 10 Ways for Students to Stay Engaged This Summer
